text:
@SenKamalaHarris Congress needs to stop pretending like he didn't do a bunch of overtly negative things to slow COVID-19 Testing.
-Declined kits from WHO
-Made useless kits he couldn't sell to the public
-Passed the buck to states, then disrupted the supply chain by stealing kit components.
